Rulings.Edison:
●You can't use Tribute Doll to Special Summon a Special Summon-only monster like Dark Necrofear.
●You can use Monster Tokens as a cost for Tribute Doll.
●If you Special Summon a monster with Tribute Doll, you can't activate Diffusion Wave-Motion on that monster because it can't attack that turn due to Tribute Doll's effect. However, you can use Diffusion Wave-Motion on the monster during your next turn.
●You can combine Soul Exchange with Tribute Doll to Tribute your opponent's monster as the cost of Tribute Doll.
Rulings.Tengu:
●You cannot use Tribute Doll to Special Summon a Special Summon-only monster like Dark Necrofear.
●You can use Monster Tokens as a cost for Tribute Doll.
●If you Special Summon a monster with Tribute Doll, you cannot activate Diffusion Wave-Motion on that monster because it cannot attack that turn due to Tribute Doll's effect. However, you can use Diffusion Wave-Motion on the monster during your next turn.
●You can combine Soul Exchange with Tribute Doll to Tribute your opponent's monster as the cost of Tribute Doll.
Rulings.Goat:
●You cannot use Tribute Doll to Special Summon a Special Summon-only monster like Dark Necrofear.
●You can use Monster Tokens as a cost for Tribute Doll.
●If you Special Summon a monster with Tribute Doll, you cannot activate Diffusion Wave-Motion on that monster because it cannot attack that turn due to Tribute Doll's effect. However, you can use Diffusion Wave-Motion on the monster during your next turn.
●You can combine Soul Exchange with Tribute Doll to Tribute your opponent's monster as the cost of Tribute Doll. “Tribute Doll” is not a targeting effect.
●If the monster Special Summoned by “Tribute Doll” is sent to the GY and Special Summoned in the same turn, that monster may attack.
●Q: If Player A takes control of Player B’s monster with “Change of Heart” and activates “Tribute Doll” which Player B chains “Imperial Order” to, what happens to Player B’s monster? 
A: Player B's monster would be Tributed when you activate Tribute Doll. This is assuming Player B allowed the Change of Heart to resolve, which it sounds like they did.

Rulings.Base:
1. You cannot use "Tribute Doll" to Special Summon a 'Special Summon-only' monster like "Dark Necrofear".
2. You can use Monster Tokens as a cost for "Tribute Doll".
3. If you Special Summon a monster with "Tribute Doll", you cannot activate "Diffusion Wave-Motion" on that monster because it cannot attack that turn due to the effect of "Tribute Doll". However, you can use "Diffusion Wave-Motion" on the monster during your next turn.
4. You can combine "Soul Exchange" with "Tribute Doll" to Tribute your opponent's monster as the cost of "Tribute Doll".
